title: Caught in the Coup: The Fight to Save America
description: The fight to save America's Republic is raging. National Bestselling Author Angela Stanton King has found herself knee-deep in the fray. “Right smack dab in the middle.” After receiving a full unconditional pardon from President Donald J. Trump, Angela ran as a qualified Republican candidate during the season deemed as "the most important election in the Nation." John Lewis's Georgia Congressional seat was up for grabs and the city of Atlanta was at a crossroads. In wake of John Lewis’s untimely passing, and the Black Lives Matter riots that took place over the summer, Angela’s voice resounded with the promise of hope. The stakes were high, and all odds were stacked against her.On election day November 3, 2020 there was an alleged water main break that stopped the count in Fulton County Georgia; as a world of corruption ensued.Hear one woman’s story of how she made it from the Prison, to the Palace, to the Coup.
author: Angela Stanton King
